#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int rev(int x);

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int a,cont=0,b;
        cin>>a;
        int flag=0;
        while(flag==0)
        {
            b= rev(a);
            if(b==a)
            {
                flag = 1;
            }
            else
            {
                a = a+b;
                cont++;
            }
        }
        cout<<cont<<" "<<a<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

int rev(int n)
{
    int r,num=0;
    while(n>0)
    {
        r = n%10;
        num = num*10 + r;
        n = n/10;
    }
    return num;
}
